title: Polymer modulated ink rheology and compatibility enables homogenized printing of a Spiro-OMeTAD transport layer for scalable and stable perovskite solar modules
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6821-6832
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01230E, Paper
Jin Li, Baojing Fan, Xukai Liu, Yuxin Liu, Zhi Xing, Chenxiang Gong, Zhaoyang Chu, Linfeng Li, Xiangchuan Meng, Rui Guo, Fuyi Wang, Xiaotian Hu, Yiwang Chen
By improving the rheological properties of Spiro-OMeTAD, we achieved fully functional layer-printed perovskite solar cells with record-high efficiencies.
